hero.title: Government Services, Made Simple
hero.description: Understand government schemes, forms, and notices in your native language — safely and easily.

features.subtitle: Simple guidance • Safe access • Native language support

card1.title: Government Schemes
card1.description: We explain available government schemes and services in simple, plain language—no jargon, no confusion. Whether it's pension schemes, healthcare benefits, or financial assistance programs, we break down complex information into easy-to-understand steps so you can access what you're entitled to without any hassle.

card2.title: Form Guidance
card2.description: All guidance is available in Kannada and other regional languages for easy understanding. We provide step-by-step instructions on how to fill out government forms correctly, what documents you need, and where to submit them.

card3.title: Notice Explainer
card3.description: Learn how to identify fake messages and avoid government-related scams. We help you understand official government notices, distinguish them from fraudulent ones, and explain what actions you need to take.

card4.title: Scam Alert
card4.description: We only guide you and redirect to official government portals—no data collection. Stay safe from fraudsters who pose as government officials asking for money, OTPs, or personal information.

card5.title: Doc Updates
card5.description: We keep you informed about important document updates and renewals including Aadhaar, passport, ration card, and more.

card6.title: Help Center Locator
card6.description: Find the nearest government offices, Jan Seva Kendras, and authorized help centers in your area with accurate contact details and directions.

login.title: Welcome to SevaSaathi
login.subtitle: Sign in to receive verified scam alerts and safety updates.
login.note: We never ask for OTP, PIN, or bank details.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: SevaSaathi is a dedicated digital platform designed to bridge the gap between senior citizens and government services in India.
about.mission: To empower senior citizens with the knowledge, guidance, and support they need to access their rightful benefits without confusion, fear, or dependency.
about.serve: SevaSaathi serves as a trusted companion for senior citizens across India, offering information about pension schemes, healthcare benefits, and government services.

q1.question: Is SevaSaathi a government website?
q1.answer: No, SevaSaathi is not a government website. We are an independent guidance platform.

q2.question: Is SevaSaathi free to use?
q2.answer: Yes, SevaSaathi is completely free to use.

q3.question: Do you collect or store my personal information?
q3.answer: No, we do not collect, store, or share any personal information.

q4.question: How can I identify fake government messages?
q4.answer: Government agencies never ask for money via SMS or WhatsApp or request OTPs.

q5.question: What government schemes are available for senior citizens?
q5.answer: There are many schemes including pension, savings, and health insurance programs.

q6.question: Can I get help in my native language?
q6.answer: Yes! SevaSaathi provides guidance in Kannada and other regional languages.

q7.question: How do I apply for a government scheme?
q7.answer: Select a scheme, follow the guidance, and apply via the official portal.

q8.question: Where can I find help centers near me?
q8.answer: Use the Help Center Locator to find nearby government offices.

q9.question: What documents do I need?
q9.answer: Common documents include Aadhaar, PAN, age proof, and address proof.

q10.question: How will I receive updates?
q10.answer: Enable notifications after logging in to receive scheme updates.
